errors.scriptaContext:
You can write mathematical formulas, equations, etc. using a [index math element] , e.g., [m a^2 + b^2 = c^2] . Here is what we wrote: [code [math a^2 + b^2 = c^2] ] . The shorthand form [code [m a^2 + b^2 = c^2] ] also works. If you want, you can use TeX/LaTex syntax, [code $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$ ] .

For code, you can use a [index code element] . Thus [code a^2 + b^ = c^2 ] is produced by writing [code [code a^2 + b^ = c^2] ] . You can also enclose code in backticks, e.g., [bt ] a^2 + b^2 = c^2 [bt ] .
errors.latexContext:
%%% Line 51
For code, you can use a \index{code element}\textit{code element} . Thus \lstinline|a^2 + b^ = c^2| is produced by writing \lstinline|[code a^2 + b^ = c^2]| . You can also enclose code in backticks, e.g., \texttt{\char96{}} a^2 + b^2 = c^2 \texttt{\char96{}} .
errors.fixHint: Check whether the command is intentional. If so, ensure the preamble defines it. If not, fix the export function that generated it.

errors.scriptaContext:
- [b Saving] . When editing your document, Scripta saves it every 3 seconds.

- [b Navigation] . To navigate back and forth between documents in Scripta, use the keyboard shortcuts [code ctrl-[ ] and [code ctrl-] ] or the buttons [b B] and [b F] .
errors.latexContext:
%%% Line 379
\item \textbf{Navigation} . To navigate back and forth between documents in Scripta, use the keyboard shortcuts \errorHighlight{[code]?} ctrl-\errorHighlight{[ - can't have space after the bracket}\errorHighlight{extra ]?} and \lstinline|ctrl-| \errorHighlight{extra ]?} or the buttons \textbf{B} and \textbf{F} .
errors.explanation: Parser error marker \errorHighlight leaked into LaTeX output
errors.fixHint: The parser produced an error expression that the exporter rendered literally. Either fix the parser to handle this input, or add a fallback in exportExpr that strips/replaces \errorHighlight markers.
Check that \begin{thebibliography}{N} is emitted before \bibitem entries and that the list counter is properly initialised.

errors.scriptaContext:
Albert Einstein, “Über einen die Erzeugung und Verwandlung des Lichtes betreffenden heuristischen Gesichtspunkt” Annalen der Physik, 17 (1905), pp. 132–148 (On a Heuristic Point of View Concerning the Production and Transformation of Light)

| bibitem einstein1905b
errors.fixHint: Check that \begin{thebibliography}{N} is emitted before \bibitem entries and that the list counter is properly initialised.

errors.scriptaContext:
“Über die von der molekularkinetischen Theorie der Wärme geforderte Bewegung von in ruhenden Flüssigkeiten suspendierten Teilchen” Annalen der Physik, 17 (1905), pp. 549–560 ( On the Motion of Small Particles Suspended in Stationary Liquids as Required by the Molecular-Kinetic Theory of Heat)

| bibitem einstein1905c
errors.fixHint: Check that \begin{thebibliography}{N} is emitted before \bibitem entries and that the list counter is properly initialised.

summary: 5 errors across 3 categories. Breakdown: bibliography (3), undefined-command (1), parse-error-passthrough (1)
